1.0.0.name: wordpress/theme-blvd-news-scroller
1.0.0.description: This plugin is a simple widget with slider that rotates through posts of specified category. It incorporates the Flexslider plugin, which is the default responsive slider plugin already used within the Theme Blvd framework.
